name: admin.audit.anomaly.allow.updateItem
desc: API to allow Enterprise org admins to write/overwrite the allow list of IP blocks and ASNs from the enterprise configuration.

trusted_asns.desc: allow list of Autonomous System Numbers (ASN) in the Enterprise organization configuration.

trusted_cidr.desc: allow list of IPv4 addresses using cidr notation in the Enterprise organization configuration.

errors.endpoint_unavailable: The requested endpoint is currently unavailable.
errors.invalid_field_or_data: user attempted to write and invalid field or data to the team config
errors.unable_to_process_post_request: The user sent a malformed post request
errors.unsupported_action_describe: The user specified describe action is unsupported
errors.unsupported_action_put: The user specified put action is unsupported
